properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.service
properties.description: the service name to register, default value is ${spring.application.name}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.instance-enabled
properties.description: If instance is enabled to accept request. The default value is true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.ephemeral
properties.description: If instance is ephemeral.The default value is true.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.watch.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos discovery watch or not .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.heart-beat.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos discovery heart beat or not .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.username
properties.description: nacos discovery service's username to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.password
properties.description: nacos discovery service's password to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.namingServiceCheckTaskDelay
properties.description: nacos service center master standby node health check interval time.
